data.title: A Tier 1 Manufacturers Representative for Electronic Test And Measurement Equipment
data.text:
Weiss Technik - Provides equipment that has been designed and manufactured by some of the most experienced people in the industry. Our strong and continuous growth pattern has been a result of a progressive management philosophy, providing quality equipment and an unequaled dedication to after sales support. We take great pride in being a leader in the industry. Developing new designs, utilizing the latest technology and implementing state-of-the-art manufacturing techniques will ensure our position in the industry.

Originally established in 1979 for the purpose of servicing environmental test chambers, Weiss Technik has become an industry leader in the design, manufacture, and modification of environmental test chambers for temperature, humidity, vibration, altitude, thermal shock, portable shock chambers, burn-in chambers, custom equipment, fluid chillers, air burn-in systems, SAE dust chambers, combustion air units, automotive test systems, drive-in chambers, conditioned rooms, and forced air ovens. Weiss Technikâ€™s quality management system is registered to ISO9001-2008 ANSI/ISO/ASQ Q9001-2008 (Exclusions: None).

Weiss Technik is a member of the Weiss Group, a division of the Schunk Group of Heuchelheim, Germany. Weiss has over 50 years of experience in the manufacture of environmental test chambers and employs 1,700 people in 21 group companies across Europe and in China. Weiss is a member of the Schunk-Group. For further information about Weiss, please visit our website.
